name: Renegade Robots!
description:
!!! FOR WEB VERSION: Make sure to click the game window BEFORE pressing enter or space to get past the start menu. Otherwise, an audio bug occurs where multiple songs play at once - just a weird godot/gotm.io embed error. Thank you!

NOTE: Web version has some audio clipping issues and slight lag, so I recommend downloading the game if possible for the best experience.

---

Uh oh! Looks like Dr. Electron forgot a semicolon, and now his entire lab is going haywire! You'll need to enlist the help of an unlikely hero to get you to the exit. Fight through hordes of enemies as you collaborate with the power of artificial intelligence, using robotics to your advantage and fighting metal with metal!

Made for Wowie game jam 4.0.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys / WASD  -  Move

Enter / Space  -  Advance text, call robot

Thanks for playing!
